Posts.Content: hi everyone - not been on here for a while cos im getting onwith life again after my boobie removal, chemo and radio..... now ive got my date for recon... 5th july - seen the surgeon today and its all systems go..... realy scared - wanna know how i wil feel when i wake up and when should i start to be about to walk around the house - and most importantly - go to the pub lolxxxx
Posts.Title: reconstruction - using the tram flap method - anyone can reassure...

Posts.Content: hiya....i m deb and live in wigan.   i had boob off in may l0 and they removed l6 nodes...and the cancer had gone into one.  they say anything under 3 nodes affected is good news.. i still had to have chemo which was hard but you get through it...had my last session on christmas eve... im feeling fitter now and am getting around and out and about .  i am having radiotherapy in a few weeks time.... which i think will be easier than the chemo...  i think clair that you must be coping already cos you are on here a day after the op which is great... the waiting time for your results is pretty shit but just focus on getting yourself strong from the op first.   good luck with the results. dont worry too much it will all be ok..xxxxxxx
Posts.Title: fresh from my op!
